title: Uh oh! FYXO just stole your KOM!
content:
Our mate FYXO down in Australia sent out an email with the title “Uh oh! FYXO just stole your KOM!” to promote their new STRAYA shirt, in the Strava font. The STRAYA shirts are in stock at FYXO.

… and they just released their 2022 Calendar if you’d like some stunning bikes on your calendar. Hit up FYXO to buy!

The post Uh oh! FYXO just stole your KOM! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: prolly
